metadata.name: The Passenger (#1)
metadata.description:
Photo taken on the famous "les planches" of Trouville-sur-mer in Normandy (France), in February 2011

It was very cold, with an icy wind.
My little girl was protected in her hooded coat. She put on the passenger hat, over her hood.
And that was it.

Photograph : 10368x6912 pixels, 300 DPI, JPEG



The passenger is an ode to contemplation.
The original idea is to integrate a character into a landscape photograph.

The passenger is not a ghost.
The passenger is not threatening.
The passenger is inside us.
But you are free to see the passenger as you wish...

Each photograph is taken in long exposure, without any photomontage.

« The passenger » is my first series, exploring the crossroads of landscape photography, portrait, and dreamlike photography.
